item.description: Details: Theme: Palestinian cinema ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ 3 November 2023 9.30 PM CEST/CAT Duration: ca. 99 mins Watch party: https://stream.provo.lol Oceans of Injustice (2017), written by Farah Nabulsi, directed by Bruno de Champris, 11 mins.
